set.name: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

card.name: Bolbalzak "Sword Flash" Dragon, Blue Divine Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Poseidia Dragon/Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Fire Birds. ■ Whenever one of your Dragons attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature you may put it under this creature. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put choose cards under this card and put them into your graveyard. If you do, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 9000 or less and destroy them. If you put a Dragon that has Sword Flash in its name into your graveyard in this way, untap this creature. ■ Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Angel Command

property.name: Rules
Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Armored Dragons. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may untap it. ■ While battling a creature that has power 12000 or more, this creature gets +11000 power. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Flame Command/Samurai

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Bird you may put it into the battle zone. If that card is a Dragon, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. If that card is "Überdragon Sunburst NEX" you may put it on top of this card. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Type
property.value: Cross Gear

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ This card may be crossed to a creature that has Lupia in its name for no cost. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, search your deck. You may take an Armored Dragon from it, show it your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, untap all Dragons in your mana zone. ■ If you have Bolmeteus Musha Dragon or a Dragon that has NEX in its name, each of your other Dragons gets "power attacker +4000" and breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird/Flame Monster

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have Double Cross in their names may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Each of your Flame Commands in the battle zone get "speed attacker".

property.name: Watermark
property.value: {Kung Fu} {Soul}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird/Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons that has "Sword Flash" in its name attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has less power than it. ■ Saver: Dragons that have "Sword Flash" in their name. (If one of your Dragons that has "Sword Flash" in its name would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. (Dragonoids don't count.) They can't cost less than 2.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ All Dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature that has "NEX" in its name battles, you may destroy this creature. If you do, untap that creature and it wins the battle.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each creature in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race has "speed attacker." (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from among them into your hand, then put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Untap one of your Dragons in the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have NEX or Lupia in its name gets +1000 power.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMC-67 Dramatic Wars: Fire and Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Your Dragons may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put it into your mana zone instead. If you do, you may return a Dragon from your mana zone to your hand.

property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {RELEASE} - Bolshack Dragon, the Temporal Blaze (When this creature would leave, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead.)
